name: Isolation (itch) (auropsoft)
description:
This is a small experimental interactive experience, barely worth calling a game, that was made for Trijam #191 in 3 hours.

Movement with WASD or arrow keys.

Asset sources:
Background texture: https://3djungle.net/textures/marble-other/6703/
Music from: https://soundimage.org/drama/ (ALONE AGAIN)
Character sprites: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rolling-ball-assets

Build with Unity
